channel.title: Display combat level
channel.description: how do i make my client (or server) display my coombat level here? [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/27086729/help.PNG[/img] at the top of the image under weapon: iron scimmy

item.title: Display combat level
item.dc:creator: @matzie matzie
item.description:
@matzie wrote:

If the client does not have the spot for it you can’t without editing your client. All i can say is every sentence/word on that interface has a “number” associated with the location of the output. Though the locations are determined by the clients set up. Given the looks of your client it seems like a 317,377 setup so i don’t think the line exists.

Read full topic
